nodes.text: The Isle of Seclusion was the name given by the ancients to a stretch of land on Ashla, the primary moon of the planet Tython. The isle was located in an ocean, and had warm, golden sand under a burning sun. The area was inhabited by carnivorous wingmaws.

In the months following the Starlight Beacon dedication ceremony in which he received a terrible Force vision, Jedi Master Elzar Mann came to the Isle of Seclusion seeking solitude and focus to meditate on what he had seen. He waded out into the sea to isolate himself, and eventually received a vision that compelled him to leave Ashla for the planet Valo.
